caption.center: STATE OF TENNESSEE v. KEVIN LEE WILLIAMS.

court.center: Court of Criminal Appeals of Tennessee, at Nashville.

posture.unpublished:
[EDITOR'S NOTE: This case is unpublished as indicated by the issuing court.] Appeal from the Circuit Court for Montgomery County; No. 40900112; Michael R. Jones, Judge.
Judgment of the Circuit Court is Affirmed.

attorneys.unpublished:
Daniel A. Stephenson, Clarksville, Tennessee, for the appellant, Kevin Lee Williams.
Robert E. Cooper, Jr., Attorney General and Reporter; Sophia S. Lee, Assistant Attorney General; John Carney, District Attorney General, and Robert Nash, Assistant District Attorney General, for the appellee, State of Tennessee.

panel.unpublished: Jerry L. Smith, J., delivered the opinion of the court, in which Alan E. Glenn and Robert W. Wedemeyer, JJ., joined.Page 2
